name: Interesting|Thetriviagameforallthefamily
0:
”Alexa, open interesting trivia”
”the answer is one”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: interesting trivia
des:
This is a skill that gives you 5 questions from easy to hard. You have unlimited time to answer them. Answer all of them right and be the winner!

This skill is a massive database of Trivia questions which is constantly expanding using advanced Algorithms to find questions from the internet! if you have a question that you want to add then contact me (anush.patel@ifqantasvirtual.com) 

I hope you enjoy using this Skill as much as I loved coding this! Be sure to leave feedback!

If you enjoyed using this skill be sure to check out my other skill (with random facts! the Skill name is "Interesting? | Quirky and Interesting Facts")

Thanks for considering this skill!


To Play just say "Alexa, open Interesting Trivia" and then for the questions just say "the answer is..." or Just say the number!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
